1205400.name: NASCAR Heat 4 - December Paid Pack
1205400.description:
Buy the NASCAR Heat 4 December DLC content and get 35+ new paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, 10+ new paint schemes from the NASCAR Xfinity Series, and 5+ new paint schemes from the NASCAR Gander Outdoors Truck Series, 2 new custom car templates, and 3 new Challenges! Paint schemes to include many of your favorite designs, including:

MENCS:
Michael McDowell, A&W All American Food Scheme
Ryan Blaney, Dickies Scheme
Corey Lajoie, Scooby Doo Scheme
Daniel Hemric, Kalahari Scheme
NXS:
Austin Cindric, Pirtek Scheme
Garrett Smithley, Trophy Tractor Scheme
Tyler Reddick, Roland Scheme
NGOTS:
Brett Moffitt, Worx Scheme
Grant Enfinger, ThorSport Scheme
Matt Crafton, Jack Links / Menards
1205400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
